QuestData.Title: This IS In My Contract.
QuestData.Description: To perform my ritual I need to use a special cave I have prepared at Gloombound Barrow.$b$bMeet me there and I will "give" you your reward. Hee hee.
QuestData.RewardText: Great deal right? You got to kill a demon, your fancy weapon got more fancy, and I get to be the master now. Everybody wins!

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Daglop to start the ritual
